about_the_game:
Captain Edgar is a captivating FTD game that immerses you in the life of an astronaut navigating a mysterious dystopia. (Featuring FPS, Tower Defense, Base Building, and much more all at once.)

    Captain Edgar begins in a world where life on a polluted and exhausted Earth is nearing its end. Humanity's hope lies in the search for a new habitable planet. You are tasked with surviving on this alien outpost, transforming it into a haven for mankind, and defending it against nightly raids. Everything is out to get you: the planet's wildlife, invading species, the unforgiving environment, and even other survivors. Do whatever it takes to survive another night.

  • Outpost Building

    Explore this uncharted world, gather essential resources, and combine and upgrade your outpost units to build your own fortress.


  • Loot & Farm

    In Exploration Mode, collect minerals and environmental resources while experiencing the unique open world. Automate the collection and processing of resources with conveyors and machines, from droid farming to environmental transformation systems.


  • Simulation Computer

    Connect to a satellite through your Capsule Simulation Computer to design and build outposts that defend your region or manage planetary resources. Cultivate droid farms, manage electricity, upgrade your vehicle, and customize everything from your outpost's flag to its name.


  • Unique Weapon

    Make the most of the distinctive ZEN Firearm with its varied protoslag attributes and use ammunition with different performance characteristics. Ensure your preparations for the night are seamless.


  • Night Watch

    When night falls, weapons are drawn, and conflicts are resolved through bloodshed. Citizens, set up your astronaut militias, establish your defense systems for your bases, and defend until the night is over – but each night will be bloodier than the last.

    In this dystopia, every decision is crucial. Can you strike the right balance between economy and defense? Do you need more astronaut soldiers, a higher-level base, or an additional production facility? Will you keep the enemies at bay with your weapons or charge towards them with your vehicle? It will be a tough night, but seeing the sunrise over your base and living to see another day is priceless.












    In Captain Edgar®: Giza, sound effects are more than just effects; they’re a way to express our style of play and to inspire others. These sounds aren’t merely extras to be hastily added at the end of a project; they’re integral to the experience, just like the main characters. The sounds were meticulously recorded by a passionate studio.







    This game is a passionate project created by a small team. We plan to add a vast galaxy and Coop system. Reach out to us and share your thoughts, ideas, and critiques – we are listening to your feedback.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is set in a fictional space world where the player assumes the role of an adventurer. The player engages in fights and battles and may kill or dispatch alien enemies and possibly using guns, machines, cars and other  weapons. The game shows blood effects and rag-doll integrated death animations.
